safari-changing-alert.message: Safari is changing how extensions work

feature-faster-2.message: By blocking annoying ads such as pop-ups, video ads and banners, pages load faster.

feature-faster-1.message: We’ve designed Adblock Plus for Safari to be much faster than the current Adblock Plus extension.

block-ads-safari.message: Blocking annoying ads on Safari is still possible

tos-message.message: By clicking on the button above you agree to our terms of use.

app-store-button-label.message: Get Adblock Plus on the App Store

feature-aa-1.message: Websites need money to stay free. Support them by allowing Acceptable Ads (on by default).

feature-aa-2.message: Want to block all ads? No problem. Learn how

block-ads-safari-2.message: The good news is the all-new Adblock Plus for Safari app allows you to continue blocking annoying ads while using Safari.

title.message: Adblock Plus for Safari is changing

block-ads-safari-1.message: Due to changes in the way Safari handles extensions, the old version of Adblock Plus for Safari will no longer work.

screenshot-alt.message: Screenshot of Adblock Plus for Safari

description.message: Apple’s extension changes mean we have to change Adblock Plus, but don’t worry - we’ve still got your back on Mac!
